TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ManifestReader extends System.Object
public ref class ManifestReader abstract sealed

summary.span: 将 XML 清单文件读取为对象表示形式。

span.span: Reads an XML manifest file into an object representation.

summary.span: 读取指定的清单 XML 并返回对象表示形式。

span.span: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

span.span: Specifies an input stream.

param.name: preserveStream
param.span: 指定是否在生成的清单对象的 InputStream 属性中保留输入流。

span.span: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the InputStream property of the resulting manifest object.

param.span: ManifestWriter 用来重建对象表示形式中未表示的输入。

span.span: Used by ManifestWriter to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.

summary.span: 读取指定的清单 XML 并返回对象表示形式。

span.span: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.

returns.span: 清单的基对象表示形式。

span.span: A base object representation of the manifest.

returns.span: 可以强制转换为 AssemblyManifest、ApplicationManifest 或 DeployManifest，以访问更具体的功能。

span.span: Can be cast to AssemblyManifest, ApplicationManifest, or DeployManifest to access more specific functionality.

Public Shared Function ReadManifest (path As String, preserveStream As Boolean) As Manifest
public: static Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::Manifest ^ ReadManifest(System::String ^ path, bool preserveStream);

span.span: The name of the input file.

param.name: preserveStream
param.span: 指定是否在生成的清单对象的 InputStream 属性中保留输入流。

span.span: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the InputStream property of the resulting manifest object.

param.span: ManifestWriter 用来重建对象表示形式中未表示的输入。

span.span: Used by ManifestWriter to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.

param.span: 如果指定的输入文件是 PE 中的嵌入清单，则此选项不起作用。

span.span: This option is not honored if the specified input file is an embedded manfiest in a PE.

span.span: Specifies the expected type of the manifest.
Valid values are "AssemblyManifest", "ApplicationManifest", or "DepoyManifest".
Specifies an input stream.
